description: Try our easy to follow Polenta Bake With Pumpkin & Spinach recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Polenta Bake With Pumpkin & Spinach Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a large spoon, transfer polenta to pan with pumpkin and spread to cover base. Push small handfuls of spinach, reserving 1 cup, into polenta. Scatter over peppers and remaining parmesan. Bake for 20 minutes or until polenta is golden. Top with reserved spinach. To serve, drizzle over glaze and remaining oil.

Bake for 20 minutes or until polenta is golden. Top with reserved spinach. To serve, drizzle over glaze and remaining oil.
